title: Verdant Balcony Retreat
description: Anika transformed her tiny 8x10 ft balcony into a lush escape with vertical planters, reused containers, and a thriving herb corner. Her passion started during the pandemic, and she now grows 15+ varieties of edible and ornamental plants.
quote: Gardening brought peace into my daily life. Every plant I grow teaches me something about patience and care.

title: Rooftop Herb Haven
description: Nusrat's rooftop herb garden is a culinary paradise. With more than 20 varieties including mint, basil, thyme, and coriander, her green space provides her family with fresh herbs all year round.
quote: The aroma from my herb garden is therapy in itself.

title: Tiny Jungle Balcony
description: Rezaul turned his small apartment balcony into a jungle escape using hanging pots, climbers, and tropical plants. His space is shaded, cool, and full of life year-round.
quote: Even in a concrete jungle, nature has a place.

title: The Vertical Greenscape
description: Mahmudul built a vertical greenscape on the side of his home using recycled materials. It houses more than 30 native and exotic species, attracting butterflies and birds.
quote: My garden climbs the wall and brings color to the street.

title: The Urban Jungle Terrace
description: Salma's terrace is a miniature forest, home to bonsais, dwarf fruit trees, and a serene water feature that helps her meditate and relax after work.
quote: This is not just a garden—it's my personal retreat.

title: Community Green Patch
description: Tania initiated a community garden project in her neighborhood. Now 15 families share the joy of growing vegetables, herbs, and flowers together.
quote: We grow together, literally and emotionally.
